name: Tickets Tab
description:
Within Tickets Tab there are four specific views/icons (10.1.0):
-[My Offers icon](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/416479&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc)
-[Ticket Forward icon](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/416482&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc)
-[Wallet View](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/20551)
-[Buy Tickets View](https://testrail.testeng.mlbinfra.net/index.php?/suites/view/192826&group_by=cases:section_id&group_order=asc)

All features are housed in its own test suite, where specific and in-depth verification for each are defined


This is TicketTab for BP app versions prior to 13.0.0 release. This view is also planned to be viewable/toggible during early BETA releases of 13.0.0
